description:
Watch Craig Finn play "Shamrock" at The Current
Support The Current: https://support.mpr.org/youtube  

On a visit to The Current, singer-songwriter Craig Finn gave a solo acoustic performance of an unreleased song — a beautiful, heartstring-pulling composition entitled "Shamrock." Watch the performance above. 

Musician
Craig Finn – vocals and guitar

Credits
Guest – Craig Finn @steadycraig 
Host – Jill Riley
Producer – Nilufer Arsala
Video – Erik Stromstad
Audio – Evan Clark
Graphics – Natalia Toledo
Digital Producer – Luke Taylor

title: Craig Finn solo acoustic performance of "Shamrock" #shorts #acoustic #music

description:
Watch Valley perform "Water the Flowers, Pray for a Garden" at The Current
Support The Current: https://support.mpr.org/youtube  

Toronto band Valley visited The Current studio to play songs from their latest album, "Water The Flowers, Pray For A Garden." 

Watch a performance of their song "Water the Flowers, Pray for a Garden" above.

Musicians
Robert Laska – guitar, lead vocals
Karah James – drums, harmonica, backing vocals
Alex Dimauro – guitar, backing vocals
Ian Moore – guitar, keys

Credits
Guests – @ThisIsValley 
Host – Bill DeVille
Producer – Derrick Stevens
Audio – Evan Clark
Video – Alex Simpson, Eric Xu Romani
Graphics – Natalia Toledo
Digital Producer – Luke Taylor
